name: ASKOBAR NETWORK
description: A New Vision for ASKOBAR: ASKOBAR NETWORK (ASKO) is evolving into a deflationary memecoin deconomy on Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain. Transitioning into a community powered ecosystem, which will support the first memecoin price prediction marketplace. ASKOBAR ZOO Marketplace: ASKOBAR plans to introduce a unique platform that bridges meme coins with users. ASKO token holders will gain access to prediction powers for popular meme coins and DAO-style governance via Snapshot. ASKO holders will be able to leverage their price prediction accuracy to earn rewards and premiums, offering a symbiotic relationship for meme coin enthusiasts and the ASKOBAR ecosystem.
